ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - flowers
ygData.msgSnippet: Definitely get one.  About 6 months ago a monk in the guild gave my wife a flower once, it is white and not stackable but don t remember the name, and she won
ygData.messageBody:
Definitely get one. About 6 months ago a monk in the guild gave my wife a
flower once, it is white and not stackable but don't remember the name, and
she won 5 big lottoes in a row, including Donal's legs and a Sarnak Battle
Shield. Nice good luck charm heh.

Shada Iceheart [Retired]
<Afterlife>

> I know I've seen them in game before, but for the life of me I can't
> remember where. Does anyone know where you can get flowers
> in EQ? Foraged,
> bought, it doesn't matter. Thanks. ;-)
>
> Gilgurth
> Minstrel of 51 Levels
> Ytrilynth's Horde
> Zebuxoruk
